description: Syncly seamlessly integrates with HighQ to securely sync legal data and documents in real-time across your tech stack, eliminating the need for manual uploads and ensures that all parties have access to the most up-to-date information.

faqs.question: How secure is Syncly?
faqs.answer: Syncly is trusted by some of the largest global banks and law firms. It’s SOC2 compliant and have built in many security related features to further our position.

faqs.question: How does it work with my Thomson Reuters product?
faqs.answer: Syncly connect to HighQ or iManage and works seamlessly in the background. You’ll receive email notifications once archivals are complete.

faqs.question: Does Syncly store my data?
faqs.answer: No, Syncly does not store any of the data it handles for you.
